website_summaries.verdict: The Gel DS Trainer 21 from Asics is a shoe that is ideal for road running. It has the necessary support and cushioning systems that are essential for performance training and high mileage running. Generally, the runners found this version more satisfying than the older versions.
pros: The Gel DS Trainer 21 comes with an updated upper which is more durable and breathable
The Seamless Construction allows runners to wear this shoe comfortably without using socks
Many runners appreciated the Heel Clutching System, which makes use of an exoskeleton that secures the rear part of the foot in place
The shoe’s traction and grip were enhanced and runners found it to be very effective
The 21st version of the Asics Gel DS Trainer delivers a good blend of support and cushioning through high quality components in the mid-sole
It features the ComforDry Sock Liner technology, which keeps the foot dry and odor-free
cons: Some runners noted that the outsole was a bit too hard that it didn’t quite hold onto the roads pretty well
Others experienced the upper unit near the heel area rip apart after a few months
A few felt their toes get clumped together by the narrow forefoot area

customer_reviews.title: Lovely to run in.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice running shoe for those with flat feet. I have had Asics when I first started running and it was nice to get back to them again. A good price for a really comfortable running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was recommended to try Asics
customer_reviews.text: I have always struggled to find trainers that would suit my needs both for running and training. I was recommended to try Asics, and they are by far the most comfortable trainers I've ever owned. Be warned: I usually wear 4, so I got a 4.5 and it fits perfectly. Asics are a bit smaller than usual. Also: these shoes are for overpronators. If you supinate they will hurt you. Find out what kind of shoe you need before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers for running
customer_reviews.text: A little on small size but do me ok, fantastic trainers as stops pain in my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quality brand
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable supportive shoe. My orthotics fit well. Use for gym. Flattering shoe (make feet look smaller!)
customer_reviews.author: Hawky

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size bigger than your normal size
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comfy trainers but I'm normally 6.5-7 and bought a 7 and they only just fit. In my experience with asics though they usually stretch with wearing. I just lostened the laces and they were ok.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleL

customer_reviews.title: Lovely trainers bought them for my partner it's her second ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainers bought them for my partner it's her second pair she has had she loves them and they have lasted ages for the amount of running she does would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: geoffrey walker

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several pairs of gel sauces and always go for size 39. This is the first pair that have been too small and less comfortable overall. Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hii I'm gonna keep the shoe thank you
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my fit I'm size 6.5 but didn't fit I'm going give it to my sister in law as gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good kicks
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of this particular model. They are perfect for mr.
customer_reviews.author: bizzilizzi

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are work shoes for me and they are so comfortable. Really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Doolin

product_meta.title: ASICS Women's Gel-ds Trainer 21 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Asics ds trainer 21 women's is a lightweight race trainer, it is designed to provide moderate stability for the over-pronator. The stability is provided by the new dynamic duomax support system which has been positioned specifically for running. Open mesh on the upper provides breathable coverage. Seamless upper construction allows for irritation-free sockless wear. In this 21st version see's the introduction of the ahar+ outsole material, this improves cushioning and enhances durability. The women's Asics ds trainer 21 has a wet grip material on the sole is designed to enhance traction on wet surfaces and help you whatever is thrown your way. The rear foot and forefoot gel cushioning removes shock during impact and allows movement in different directions as the foot moves through the gait cycle. The reason why the Asics ds trainer 21 is so lightweight is due to the use of the solyte midsole materials. A lighter weight midsole compound, also features enhanced cushioning and durability. Propulsion trusstic system utilizes a thermal plastic unit that connects the lateral heel to the medial forefoot. This unit works to release stored energy and propel you forward during toe-off.
feature_bullets: Seamless material upper - Helps reduce irritation and friction providing a more comfortable fit.
Impact guidance system - Allows the foot to perform a more natural heel to toe movement.
Solyte midsole technology - Provides cushioning, durability and responsiveness.
COMFORDRY sockliner - Provides moisture management and breathability.
Dynamic duomax support system - Helps to reduce the effects of overpronation.
